title: RX Chip – Your bike, now connected.
description:
Unlock smart features with the built-in RX Chip and free RX Connect app. Track, monitor, and manage your ride like never before. Just register your bike and choose a service package that fits your needs.

Note: RX Services vary by model and country — check your model’s page or the RX Services shop for full details.
